en: This photograph is titled, "TVA Coal Handling, 86507-D". It is from the collection contributed by Donald R. (Little Joe) Adams. "The books you are now looking at were started in 1968 by apprentice of different crafts and professional photographers. There were originally three sets of these books, but due to the changing of the supervision in TVA, two of the sets were destroyed. The last remaining set was in my care for about 25 years. (image shows: forming, reinforcing steel for line-pile silos.) EntryID=S099 , detail loc: Tennessee Valley Authority Notebook 3; county: houston
Era 10 - Contemporary United States (1968 to the present)
